channel.title: Help - Unable to enable USB in Whonix
channel.description:
Running whonix on VM through linux.
I have downloaded the USB extension pack, enabled USB controllers in VB, enabled automount devices in Whonix gateway and workstation - still will not recognize any USB.
If anyone could help walk me through this, it would be greatly appreciated.
thanks.

item.title: Help - Unable to enable USB in Whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Regard this: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/File_Transfer#Adding_USB_device_to_VirtualBox

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Help - Unable to enable USB in Whonix
